title: Alexander Hawke Series by Ted Bell (ePub Retail)
description:
Ted Bell is an American author of suspense novels such as Hawke and Assassin, Pirate, and Spy. He is best known for his New York Times Bestselling series of spy thriller novels featuring the character Alex Hawke. Before becoming a novelist, he was President and Chief Creative Officer of the Leo Burnett Company.

Alexander Hawke Series:
Hawke (2003)
Assassin (2004)
Pirate (2005)
Spy (2006)
Tsar (2008)
Warlord (2010)
Phantom (2012)
Crash Dive (2012 Novella)

Full Retail. ePub and Calibre Reader ready. Metadata is complete and up to date.
